thread.section_title: FactoryPure Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FactoryPure | factorypure.com
thread.title: M. Burns

author: M. Burns
title: M. Burns
text: Did a lot of research for the generator we wanted. Found Factory Pure through Google Generator search. The explanation of how the generators were cleaned and checked over and the option to by a warranty was fantastic. When purchasing, a chat opened up and it. The customer service rep was pleasant and not pushy. I did ask if we can have it shipped to the Fed EX dock...and we sure could. Overall a great experience. Have already told many people about the site. And we will be buying from them again. - Michele, Texas.
